meaningMnemonic: You have to <radical>say</radical> what you’re <radical>sell</radical>ing because people don’t like to <kanji>read</kanji>. If they walk right by and don’t read, you better say what you have for sale so they’ll know! Read it out loud to them.
readingMnemonic: What are you forced to <kanji>read</kanji> aloud to sell? <reading>Yo-</reading>yo (よ) instructions! You’d think they’d be self explanatory, but there are actually a lot of rules and tricks that you have to read to get good at yo-yoing. Read all of these out loud so you can sell them.
